apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the people holding hands emoji showcases two hands gently clasped, with one hand in a medium skin tone and the other in a medium-light skin tone, all rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The soft, rounded shapes and subtle glossiness of the hands convey a strong sense of connection, partnership, and unity, reflecting Apple's commitment to inclusive representation. This emoji is a beautiful way to symbolize friendship, romance, or any close bond between individuals, adding warmth and solidarity to digital exchanges on Apple devices.
